title: Pogačar Booed After Arriving Late to Tennis Match, Mentor Who Led Him to First Yellow Jersey Says Paris-Roubaix ‘Not His Ideal Terrain’
content:
Posh crowd in Monaco jeer Pogačar after tardiness to tennis match, Allan Peiper says Paris-Roubaix the ultimate challenge for former pupil: 'Better suited for Van der Poel.'

Read the full article at Pogačar Booed After Arriving Late to Tennis Match, Mentor Who Led Him to First Yellow Jersey Says Paris-Roubaix ‘Not His Ideal Terrain’ on Velo.
author: ahood
